pullRequest.title: [#10155] Add sortable statistic table for MSQ, plus finishing up
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #10155

Refactor num scale statistics to use sortable table
Add sortable statistic table for MSQ



Add sortable per recipient statistics table for MCQ

commit.message: Add per recipient statistics for MCQ
Refactor num scale statistics to use sortable table
Add spacing between arrow and header

nodes.bodyText: You don't want unnecessary change like this?
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -2,7 +2,7 @@ - {{ column.header }} + {{ column.header }}

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                MSQ_NUMBER_SELECTED,
          
          
            
                MSQ_OPTION_SELECTED_TIMES,
          
      
    
    
  

more expressive?

commit.message: Change variable names to be more accurate
Use CSS instead of space to format sort icon
